additionalFeeTitle: Additional fees will be charged to cover:
additionalFeeList: Soum's service fee to facilitate your purchase
whatFeeCovers: What does the Soum fee cover?
buyerProtectionExplanation: A free guarantee for 3 years or 60,000 kilometers (on essential parts), covering many mechanical and electrical components, including the engine, transmission, differential, and air conditioning system
comprehensiveInspectionExplanation: We select our cars based on precise criteria and only present the best after a thorough inspection of over 100 points
freeConsultationExplanation: We provide expert consultants in buying and selling cars to assist you at any time
customerSupportExplanation: Here to help anytime with fast, friendly service
buyWithConfidence: Buy your car confidently and stress-free with Soum!
